joinTeam.heading: BECOME PART OF OUR TEAM
joinTeam.paragraph1: Do you enjoy serving fantastic dishes in a dynamic, fast-paced, and varied work environment?
joinTeam.paragraph2: Then contact us! At MATJO, we are always looking for talented, and above all, friendly and dedicated service, bar, and kitchen staff.
joinTeam.coverletter: We look forward to receiving your application with a resume and a brief cover letter at

jobs.title: Service Staff
jobs.description: A service staff member is a professional in the hospitality industry who is involved in the care, advising, and serving of guests in gastronomic establishments.
jobs.subject: Application for Full-time Service Staff

jobs.title: Cook/Chef
jobs.description: A cook/chef is a professional in the kitchen, responsible for the preparation, refinement, and presentation of dishes in gastronomic businesses.
jobs.subject: Application for Full-time Cook/Chef

jobs.title: Content Creator
jobs.description: A content creator is a digital professional who specializes in creating, designing, and distributing multimedia content for various online platforms and social media.
jobs.subject: Application for Part-time Content Creator

jobs.title: Accountant
jobs.description: An accountant is a finance professional who is responsible for recording, classifying, and summarizing financial transactions.
jobs.subject: Application for Full-time Accountant
